attributes.action: Make honesty, truth, wisdom and integrity a prerequisite for government
attributes.additional_details:
People want government who they can trust. People who govern should have good morals. Not be hypocrites, not have double standards. We should not go to war with ulterior motives or be confused why or how we should support the US in their reckless ventures.

There should be a more measured approach to getting us out of debt. More thought needs to be put in.
